Introduction
This topic contains information about general principles for rating genitourinary disabilities, including
definition of nephropathy
evaluating nephropathy
evaluation of nephropathy and hypertension
definition of nephritis
characteristics of nephritis
evaluating nephritis
limits on separate evaluation of nephritis and cardiovascular conditions
, and
distinguishing nephritis from other types of nephropathy
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 7Â - Genitourinary Disabilities
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 7, Section None
